snippet: LEAD: On the eve of passage of a bill to ban the sale and possession of military-style assault weapons, opponents have persuaded Gov. George Deukmejian to delay a final vote in the State Senate....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: On the eve of passage of a bill to ban the sale and possession of military-style assault weapons, opponents have persuaded Gov. George Deukmejian to delay a final vote in the State Senate.

headline.main: Vote on Assault Rifles Is Stalled in California

byline.original: Special to The New York Times
